pokemon.description: Bulbasaur, the Seed Pokémon. A young Bulbasaur uses the nutrients from its seed for the energy it needs to grow.
Ivysaur, the Seed Pokémon. A Grass and Poison type. The stronger the sunlight it absorbs, the stronger this Pokémon becomes and the larger its flower bud grows.
Venusaur, the Seed Pokémon. When Venusaur spreads out its large flower petals and absorbs the rays of the sun, it becomes energized.
